programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer On The Strip/The Doll Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E11, In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Last Of The Wild Horses
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Last Of The Wild Horses, S06E11, A cowboy winds up in the middle of a turf war between a rancher and his neighbors in Last of the Wild Horses.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: King Dinosaur
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: King Dinosaur, S02E10, In King Dinosaur, the crew pokes fun as scientists are terrorized by snakes, bugs, and dinosaurs on a newly discovered planet.

programme.title: Wild Rebels
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Wild Rebels, S03E07, A retired race car driver, talked into going undercover by the police, joins a biker gang and must serve as the getaway car driver.

programme.title: Hellcats
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hellcats, S03E09, Joel and the 'bots attempt to puzzle out what's going on in the unintelligible biker film, The Hellcats (1968). Flashbacks from earlier episodes fill out the host segments.
MST3K: Zombie Nightmare, 19941124000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).
Film Crew: Killers From Space, 20070807070000 +0000, Former Mystery Science Theater 3000 crew rip apart Killers from Space.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 1)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E17, The first part of this essential guide to modern car sales techniques.
MST3K: Gunslinger, 19931009000000 +0000, The widow of a murdered sheriff attempts to clean up the crime in her small town with help from the man hired to kill her.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.
In From the Night, 20060423000000 +0000, A writer (Marcia Gay Harden) forms a compassionate bond with her nephew (Taylor Handley) after the troubled teen runs away from his parents.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

The Russell Girl, 20080127000000 +0000, Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl next door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

Candles on Bay Street, 20061126000000 +0000, Sam and Lydia have a great marriage. They're committed to each other, and to their veterinary practice. But when Sam's high school flame comes back to town, it's a time of tension for everybody.

The Locket, 20021208000000 +0000, After his mother dies, a college dropout befriends a patient at a health-care center who gives him support and guidance. Stars Vanessa Redgrave. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

The Makeover, 20130127000000 +0000, Hannah Higgins--a smart, driven Harvard-educated professor--attempts to turn blue-collar Boston beer vendor Elliot Doolittle into a viable candidate for Congress and inadvertently learns something of Elliot's side of life.

A Dog Named Christmas, 20091129000000 +0000, A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.
A Nutcracker Christmas, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E15, Lorne discovers a planet with dozens of satellites in orbit. However, inhabitants on this planet are no further advanced than the renaissance and have a flag with McKay's face. The team realize a game they had found earlier might be more than a game.

programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E16, Investigating an abandoned space station, McKay mistakenly brings one of its scientists out of stasis. The scientist explains to the team that the base was the last effort by his people to avoid the repeated culling they've endured by the Wraith.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E09, Using the communications stones, Lt. Scott and Camile Wray use their time back on Earth to visit those they’ve left behind. Aboard Destiny, the crew stumbles upon a piece of Ancient technology that carries the promise of a way home.

programme.title: Justice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E10, Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be found…until it shows up in Col. Young’s (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E13, An experiment goes wrong leaving Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) trapped in a parallel reality where martial law has been enforced and Earth is under attack from the Ori. Also starring Ben Browder, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Shroud
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E14, When Daniel Jackson turns up as a Prior asking SG-1 to aid him in a plan that might very well be a trap, it's up to Maj. Gen. Jack O'Neill and the team to not only save Jackson's life, but possibly end the war with the Ori once and for all.

programme.title: Bounty
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E15, After Netan (Eric Steinberg), and the Lucian Alliance, are undermined by SG-1 yet again, he decides to put a bounty out on their heads. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Bad Guys
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E16, Mistaken for rebels on an alien planet, SG-1 must play the part of hostage takers in hopes to buy themselves enough time to be rescued before they're executed. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Talion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E17, Barely surviving the bombing massacre of a peaceful Jaffa summit, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) must go rogue to track down and stop a Jaffa leader named Arkad (Craig Fairbrass) who plans to take control of the Jaffa nation and deliver them to the Ori.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E18, Vala's (Claudia Black) father Jacek (guest star Fred Willard) contacts Stargate Command wishing to trade information about a series of planned attacks on Earth in exchange for sanctuary on the planet. Also starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Dominion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E19, In an elaborate plan using Vala Mal Doran (Claudia Black) as bait to capture Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin), SG-1 themselves are surprised when Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) intercepts Adria from under them to use in his own evil plan.

programme.title: Unending
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E20, With extinction imminent, the Asgard hand over all their knowledge and technology to SG-1, but not before the Ori launch an attack trying to intercede. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Children Of The Gods (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E01, As Colonel Jack O'Neill and his team journey to Abydos to confront deadly warriors and laser-firing Death Gliders, O'Neill realizes that this new mission seems hauntingly familiar and that an old enemy has returned to take his revenge on Earth.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E03, In this suspenseful tale of survival of the fittest, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and the SG-1 team must attempt to remove a Goa'uld larva that has infected Kawalsky's (guest star Jay Acovone) brain … but time is running out!

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E021, Jack and Dylan begin a new life together, living aboard a yacht with Dylan's enormous trust fund at their disposal. On the surface, everything seems perfect, but Jack has some dangerous enemies.

programme.title: The Child is the Father to the Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E022, After Dylan accepts an invitation to stay at the Walsh home, he finds that old demons have returned to haunt him

programme.title: Duke's Bad Boy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E023, Brandon's gambling spins out of control. Donna feels that David's new record label is running his music.

programme.title: Perfectly Perfect
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E024, Kelly's obsession with her weight turns dangerous. Brandon and Steve vie for the same girl's attention on a television game show.

programme.title: Senior Poll
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E025, The results of the Senior Poll are in, leading some to question whether it is exclusionary.

programme.title: She Came in Through the Bathroom Window
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E026, Senior Ditch-School day proves memorable as thieves prey upon the gang at an amusement park and then Peach Pit.

programme.title: A Night To Remember
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E027, The students of West Beverly are horrified to learn that the school board has pushed through a measure that will bar any student found drunk at the prom from graduation.

programme.title: Something in the Air
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E028, The group rallies around Donna after the school board rules that she cannot participate in graduation ceremonies because of her drunkenness at the prom.

programme.title: Commencement Part 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E029, As graduation approaches, the teens of West Beverly make their final decisions about the future while reminiscing about the past.

programme.title: So Long, Auf Wiedersehen
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E001, The gang kicks off college with a huge party. Brenda is uncertain about her decision. Andrea learns hurtful information about Gil.

programme.title: The Girl From New York City
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E002, Brandon's new girlfriend has intimacy issues and Brenda has trouble at school.

programme.title: The Little Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E003, Brenda arrives back in Beverly Hills in the middle of the night and Steve's scheming ways almost backfire as the gang decides which classes to take.

programme.title: Greek To Me
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E004, It is rush week on campus. Now on the staff of the campus radio station, David and Donna man the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Radio Daze
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E005, Dylan finds Kelly with another guy. Donna is offered a daytime slot at the radio station, which causes problems with David. Andrea plans a date with her English teacher.

programme.title: Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E006, Kelly recommends that she and Dylan see other people. Mr. Walsh sets Brenda up on a blind date with his client's son.

programme.title: Moving Targets
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E007, Andrea takes initiative in her relationship with Dan. David and Kelly take sides in a fight between their parents.

programme.title: Twenty Years Ago Today
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E008, Brenda's relationship with Stuart causes a stir at the Walsh's twentieth-anniversary party. Brandon catches Dylan off guard with unexpected results.

programme.title: N.Z. Shark Attack/Bradley’s Heimlch
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E318, A man snorkeling is attacked by a great white shark. A man with Down Syndrome tries to rescue his dad.

programme.title: New Orleans Docu, Part 2/Pick-up Thrown
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E382, New Orleans police search for an armed robber on New Year's Eve. A girl is injured while riding in the back of a pick-up truck.

programme.title: Date Rape/Freezer Tongue

programme.title: Fast Food Rob/Heart Attack Hubby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E272, A fast-food employee risks their life to call 911 during a robbery. A 911 dispatcher receives a call her husband is suffering a heart attack.

programme.title: Pool Child/Atlanta Fire

programme.title: Rifle/De-fib Phone
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E171, A youngster saves his sister after an accidental shooting. A woman waiting for a heart transplant has a heart attack.

programme.title: Stabbing, Shooting/Fancy Dancer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E264, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Double Hero Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E148, While attempting to rescue a hang glider, a volunteer firefighter accidentally gets knocked down a ravine.

programme.title: Spider Bite/Runaway Truck

programme.title: High Voltage/Black Belt
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E283, A man driving his car loses control and crashes. An armed man takes his girlfriend hostage.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E183, A driver pulls 7 year old into his car and speeds off. Skydiver hit her head against the backpack of a fellow parachutist.

programme.title: Tornado Trap/LA Superman
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E153, A firefighter dispatched to their mother-in-law's home after a tornado. Man saves mother and 2 kids injured in a head-on collision in downtown LA.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E178, A woman in labor suffers a seizure and collapses. A man sleeping in apartment is awoken by a natural gas explosion.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E229, A man and his children are severely burned when their water heater explodes. A lumberjack is pinned down by a huge falling log.

programme.title: Hugo, Part 2

programme.title: Smart Victim/Speedboat Upside Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E274, A woman is trapped in the shower by a would-be rapist. A race boat drive is trapped underwater when his boat flips.
